DOC.HEADLINE: NEWS , TIPS & BARGAINS : CAJUN CELEBRATION IN LOUISIANA
DOC.TEXT: The Festivals Acadiens , a celebration of Cajun and zydeco music , Cajun and Creole food and native crafts , marks its 18th anniversary Friday , Saturday and Sunday in Lafayette , the heart of French Louisiana . The event , which draws about 100 # 000 visitors , is actually a combination of several festivals , including the Festival de Musique Acadienne , which began as a three-hour concert in 1974 and now offers nonstop music over the three days . For a festival schedule , call the Lafayette Convention and Visitors Commission , ( 800 ) 346-1958 . For fax information , call ( 800 ) 8-VIS-FAX , Ext . 650 .
